content.text: Trial 5/5, Stage 'ytraverse2': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a black object with a groove oriented along the vertical axis. The user's gaze, indicated by a red circle, is focused near the upper right section of the groove.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 250, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
